text: I'm using the embedded jars and trying to serve static resources, but I'm getting "java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.setContentLengthLong(J)V" in DefaultServlet.serveResource because I'm using 3.0 but there's no version check before calling response.setContentLengthLong(contentLength);

text: Sorry, user error since the 3.1 jar will be provided by the container. Please close.
